caption:
7L Week Highlight
 
“A Very Bad Man” is the second monograph of artist Amanda Charchian @amanda_charchian , exclusively sold @librairie7l 
 
The book is an homage to the synthetic glamour of Los Angeles, the cinema of the quotidian. These photographs were shot entirely at the Chateau Marmont on Sunset Boulevard.  Most of the characters are Amanda’s friends, creative by nature, many of which have spent countless moments engaging in the hotel’s delicate tension between discretion and public life. Photographs of Laura Harrier, Bianca Balti, Romain Gavras, Gabriette Bechtel, George Cortina, Alycia Debnam Carey and others. Additionally, nine iconic Los Angeles fine artists created works on the hotel stationary inspired by the city: Alvaro Barrington, Jonas Wood, Louise Bonnet, Freeman/Lowe, Claire Tabouret, Delphin Finley, Ariana Papademetropoulos, Matt Copson. These are loose in the book so they can be framed at will!
 
“A Very Bad Man” by Amanda Charchian
Creative direction: @pragmapatrice @olivierleone @sophihuff
regular edition: €90
limited edition of 6: €650
Proceeds from book sales go to the LA Wildfire Relief Fund.

#Librairie7L #Amandacharchian
